Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[USP_UpdateIsIncludeForECResult] Script Date: 07/03/2012 13:06:16 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[USP_UpdateIsIncludeForECResult]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[USP_UpdateIsIncludeForECResult] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='Create Proc [dbo].[USP_UpdateIsIncludeForECResult] ( @DimPoolId bigint ) AS Begin
-- Return Loans Delete From dbo.tblFactLoanECResult Where DimPoolId = @DimPoolId And DimLoanID in ( Select distinct DimLoanID From dbo.tblFactLoanReturnResult Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId )
-- Return Securities Delete From dbo.tblFactSecurityECResult Where DimPoolId = @DimPoolId And DimSecurityID in ( Select distinct DimSecurityID From dbo.tblFactSecurityReturnResult Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId )
-- Set back to original status Update dbo.tblFactLoan Set IsIncluded = 1 Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId Update dbo.tblFactSecurity Set IsIncluded = 1 Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId Update dbo.tblFactLoanSecurity Set IsIncluded = 1 Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
-- Mark Failed Loans Update dbo.tblFactLoan Set IsIncluded = 0 Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And DimLoanID in ( Select Distinct DimLoanID From dbo.tblFactLoanECResult Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId )
-- Mark Failed Securities Update dbo.tblFactSecurity Set IsIncluded = 0 Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And DimSecurityID in ( Select Distinct DimSecurityID From dbo.tblFactSecurityECResult Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId )
-- Mark Failed LoanSecurities Update dbo.tblFactLoanSecurity Set IsIncluded = 0 From dbo.tblFactLoanSecurity FLS Join dbo.tblFactLoanSecurityECResult FLSEC on FLS.DimLoanID = FLSEC.DimLoanID And FLS.DimSecurityID = FLSEC.DimSecurityID And FLS.DimPoolID = FLSEC.DimPoolID Where FLS.DimPoolId = @DimPoolId
End ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
